name.value: Medication Process 9 3.0.0-beta - MedicationAgreement - Serve - Scenario 3.x - target CheckContent - XML Format

description.value: Scenario 3.x - KWAL Medicatiegegevens MA script 3
Resource.id for MedicationRequest 1
KWAL Medicatiegegevens MA script 3
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:V2020.01/FHIR_IG#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.
Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension).
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains at least 1 MedicationRequest resource(s).
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains at least 2 entries. (Consists of 1 MedicationRequest and 1 Medication resources.)
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR MedicationRequest that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 MedicationRequest with properties: contains a resource with identifier = MBH_300_script3_MA
MedicationRequest resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/mp-MedicationAgreement'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-RegistrationDateTime' with .valueDateTime

Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationAgreement.MedicationAgreementAdditionalInformation' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.20.77.5.2.14.2050' and .code '3' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-MedicationAgreement.MedicationAgreementAdditionalInformation').value.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.20.77.5.2.14.2050' and code = '3' and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-RenderedDosageInstruction' with .valueString with a value
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-TimeInterval.Period' with .valuePeriod with .start and .end

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-TimeInterval.Period').value.where($this is Period).where(start and end).exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier' with .valueIdentifier with .system and .value

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier').value.where($this is Identifier).where(system and value).exists()

description.value: Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'unknown'
Contains .intent 'order'
Contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '33633005' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').category.where(coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '33633005' and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .medicationReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').medication.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').subject.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .requester with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').requester.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction with .additionalInstruction with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor' and .code 'OTH' and .display and .text with a value, and .asNeededCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'https://referentiemodel.nhg.org/tabellen/nhg-tabel-25-gebruiksvoorschrift#aanvullend-numeriek' and .code '1028' and .display, and .route with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and .code '34' and .display, and .doseAndRate with .doseRange with .low with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation' with .valueQuantity with .value '1' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '208' and .value '1' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code '1' and .high with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation' with .valueQuantity with .value '2' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '208' and .value '2' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code '1', and .maxDosePerPeriod with .numerator with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation' with .valueQuantity with .value '3' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '208' and .value '3' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code '1' and .denominator with .value '1' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code 'd'. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(additionalInstruction.where(coding.where(system = 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor' and code = 'OTH' and display) and text.hasValue()) and asNeeded.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding.where(system = 'https://referentiemodel.nhg.org/tabellen/nhg-tabel-25-gebruiksvoorschrift#aanvullend-numeriek' and code = '1028' and display) and route.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and code = '34' and display) and doseAndRate.where(dose.where($this is Range).where(low.where(extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation').value.where($this is Quantity).where(value = 1 and unit and system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and code = '208') and value = 1 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '1') and high.where(extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation').value.where($this is Quantity).where(value = 2 and unit and system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and code = '208') and value = 2 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '1'))) and maxDosePerPeriod.where(numerator.where(extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation').value.where($this is Quantity).where(value = 3 and unit and system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and code = '208') and value = 3 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '1') and denominator.where(value = 1 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = 'd'))).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction.additionalInstruction with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor' and .code 'OTH' and .display and .text with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-14 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(additionalInstruction.where(coding.where(system = 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor' and code = 'OTH' and display) and text.hasValue()).exists()).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction.asNeededCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'https://referentiemodel.nhg.org/tabellen/nhg-tabel-25-gebruiksvoorschrift#aanvullend-numeriek' and .code '1028' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-14 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(asNeeded.where($this is CodeableConcept).coding.where(system = 'https://referentiemodel.nhg.org/tabellen/nhg-tabel-25-gebruiksvoorschrift#aanvullend-numeriek' and code = '1028' and display).exists()).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction.route with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and .code '34' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-14 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(route.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and code = '34' and display).exists()).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction.doseAndRate with .doseRange with .low with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation' with .valueQuantity with .value '1' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '208' and .value '1' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code '1' and .high with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation' with .valueQuantity with .value '2' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '208' and .value '2' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code '1'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-14 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(doseAndRate.where(dose.where($this is Range).where(low.where(extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation').value.where($this is Quantity).where(value = 1 and unit and system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and code = '208') and value = 1 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '1') and high.where(extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation').value.where($this is Quantity).where(value = 2 and unit and system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and code = '208') and value = 2 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '1'))).exists()).exists()

description.value: Contains .dosageInstruction.maxDosePerPeriod with .numerator with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation' with .valueQuantity with .value '3' and .unit and .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and .code '208' and .value '3' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code '1' and .denominator with .value '1' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code 'd'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-14 checks if all children are present in the same parent

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationRequest).where(id = '${mp-MedAgr-mp9-MBH300script3MA-id}').dosageInstruction.where(maxDosePerPeriod.where(numerator.where(extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-PQ-translation').value.where($this is Quantity).where(value = 3 and unit and system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1.900.2' and code = '208') and value = 3 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '1') and denominator.where(value = 1 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = 'd')).exists()).exists()
